*.description: May see and clone all repositories
May see, clone and push to all repositories
May see, clone, push to, configure and delete all repositories
May administer permissions (additionally needs 'administer users' and/or 'administer groups').

list.description: Prerequisite for all other administration permissions. Without this, no configuration will be visible.

global.description: May configure core settings of SCM-Manager

*.description: May configure settings of SCM-Manager core and all plugins

read,write.description: May create, modify and delete custom repository roles and their permissions

read.description: May see all installed and available plugins

read,write.description: May see and manage all installed and available plugins

read.description: May see the repository inside the SCM-Manager

modify.description: May modify the basic properties of the repository

push.description: May change the content of the repository (push/commit)

permissionRead.description: May see the permissions of the repository

permissionWrite.description: May modify the permissions of the repository

*.description: May change everything for the repository (includes all other permissions)
